headline.main: Food News: A Fatty Diet Is Avoidable

docs.lead_paragraph: OF particular interest to the many people concerned about cutting down on calories, either to lose weight or because of health problems, is the newly revised and enlarged edition of "Low-Fat Cookery" (McGrawHill, 284 pp., $4.50).
docs.snippet: OF particular interest to the many people concerned about cutting down on calories, either to lose weight or because of health problems, is the newly revised and enlarged edition of "Low-Fat Cookery" (McGrawHill, 284 pp., $4.50).
